abstract_ssm: Typewritten and photocopied transcriptions of Theodore L. Cuyler's 1872-1899 correspondence primarily addressed or in relation to Rev. Augustus Bedlow Prichard. Cuyler was pastor of the Lafayette Avenue Presbyterian Church in Fort Greene, Brooklyn from 1860-1890.
